          UCR Music 2020-2021 Wednesday@Noon Series
         
 Department of Music 
 2020-2021  Wednesday@Noon  via Zoom Series 
 Due to COVID 19, the  Wednesday@Noon  via Zoom Series offers online concerts, lectures, and presentations of academic research by Department of Music faculty, postdoctoral researchers, students, and international guest artists and scholars. Dana Kaufman, coordinator.     
 Events are free and open to the public. 
 A link to the Zoom meeting will be provided.
